body_html:
@zxvix From your error message, it appears that you are using tf.while_loop. Can you try setting its paralle_iterations parameter to 1 and see if the error still happens?

There may be a bug in how tfdbg handles while_loops with parallel_iterations > 1.
body_text:
@zxvix From your error message, it appears that you are using tf.while_loop. Can you try setting its paralle_iterations parameter to 1 and see if the error still happens?
There may be a bug in how tfdbg handles while_loops with parallel_iterations > 1.
body:
@zxvix From your error message, it appears that you are using `tf.while_loop`. Can you try setting its `paralle_iterations` parameter to 1 and see if the error still happens?

There may be a bug in how tfdbg handles while_loops with parallel_iterations > 1.
